name: 程式設計
goals: Make students familiar with the syntax of C language and develop the programming skills of C language.
Cultivate the ability to think logically in programming.
Develop the ability to use programming in related fields.
Develop abstract thinking and reasoning skills.
syllabus:
1\. Introduction to this course.

2\. Overview of C

3\. Top-down design with functions

4\. Selection structures: if and switch statements

5\. Repetitions and loop statements

6\. Pointers

7\. Array and pointers (I)

8\. Midterm exam

9. Array and pointers (II)

10\. Strings (I)

11. Strings (II)

12\. Recursion

13\. Structure types

14\. Processing Files

15\. Pointers and dynamic data structures

16\. Final exam

grading.note: 作業或小考(上機考) 或依實際狀況調整 (百分比: 0~20%)
上機考, 依實際狀況調整 (百分比: 40~50%)
上機考, 依實際狀況調整 (百分比: 40~50%)
